name: One-Pan Egg Sandwich
description: As seen on FoodTok! This recipe makes just one serving, but you can double or quadruple it, in batches, if you’re feeding the fam. Easily whip up some bacon in your Multipurpose Steamer while the sammies are cooking: lay bacon slices on the Multipurpose Tray, cover, and microwave on high 5 min, or until cooked to your liking. Then, add the cooked bacon to your sandwiches!

ingredients.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix or CCB Dip Mix

preparation:
1. In a medium bowl, whisk eggs with dip mix. Pour egg mixture into a small, non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Cook eggs until almost cooked through, about 1 min 30 sec.
  2. Place 2 slices of bread side by side on top of egg mixture and press down. Using a flipper or your hand, carefully flip bread and eggs over. If there is egg hanging over the side of the bread, fold it over.  
  3. Top eggs with cheese, tomato, and spinach. Cook until bread is toasted, 1–2 min. Carefully flip one slice bread over the other to make a sandwich.
